Package shaharas

Class MainTest

java.lang.Object
shaharas.MainTest
class MainTest extends Object
The MainTest class contains unit tests for the Main class. It is designed to test the functionality of the main application by running test cases using input files, comparing generated output with expected solutions, and cleaning up test output files after each test run.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws IOException
      Sets up the testing environment before each test. Ensures that the output directory exists.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while creating directories.

    • testAllCaseFiles

      @Test void testAllCaseFiles() throws IOException
      Runs test cases for multiple input files, excluding specific cases. Loops through test case numbers from 1 to 12, skipping test cases 3, 6, and 7.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading/writing files.

    • runTest

      private void runTest(String inputFilePath, String outputFilePath, String solutionFilePath) throws IOException
      Executes a single test case by running the Main class with input arguments, reading the generated output, and comparing it with the expected solution.
      Parameters:
      inputFilePath - Path to the input test file.
      outputFilePath - Path to the generated output file.
      solutionFilePath - Path to the expected solution file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading files.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up test output files after each test execution. Ensures that all files in the output directory are deleted.
